TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RegionInfo extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RegionInfo extends System.Object
.class public sequential ansi serializable beforefieldinit RegionInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含国家/地区的相关信息。

span.span: Contains information about the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 类不同， 类不表示用户首选项，且不依赖于用户的语言或区域性。Unlike the class, the class does not represent user preferences and does not depend on the user's language or culture. ## 与 RegionInfo 对象关联的名称Names Associated with a RegionInfo Object 对象的名称 是在 ISO 3166 中为国家/地区定义的由两个字母组成的代码之一。The name of a object is one of the two-letter codes defined in ISO 3166 for country/region. Case 并不重要。Case is not significant. 、 和 属性以大写形式返回相应的代码。The , , and properties return the appropriate codes in uppercase. 有关当前 名称列表，请参阅 ISO 网站上的 [英语国家/地区名称和代码元素](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591) 。For the current list of names, see [English country names and code elements](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591) on the ISO website. ## 实例化 RegionInfo 对象Instantiating a RegionInfo Object 若要实例化 对象，请向 构造函数传递两个字母的区域名称（如 "us"）作为美国或特定区域性的名称（例如 "en-us" 表示英语 (美国) 。To instantiate a object, you pass the constructor either a two-letter region name, such as "US" for the United States, or the name of a specific culture, such as "en-US" for English (United States). 但是，我们建议你使用特定的区域性名称而不是两个字母的区域名称，因为 对象不是完全独立于语言的。However, we recommend that you use a specific culture name instead of a two-letter region name, because a object is not completely language-independent. 多个 属性，包括 、 和 ，它们依赖于区域性名称。Several properties, including , , and , depend on culture names. 下面的示例说明了 表示华南的三个对象的属性值的差异。The following example illustrates the difference in property values for three objects that represent Belgium. 第一个实例从区域名称实例化 (仅) ，而第二个和第三个实例化区域性名称 (fr-对于法语 (比利时) ，而 nl 是分别 (荷兰语) 的。The first is instantiated from a region name (BE) only, while the second and third are instantiated from culture names (fr-BE for French (Belgium) and nl-BE for Dutch (Belgium), respectively). 该示例使用反射来检索每个对象的属性值 。The example uses reflection to retrieve the property values of each object. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/CS/propertyvalues1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/VB/propertyvalues1.vb#2)] 在如下所示的方案中，当您实例化对象时，请使用区域性名称（而不是国家/地区名称） ：In scenarios such as the following, use culture names instead of country/region names when you instantiate a object: - 当语言名称主要重要时。When the language name is of primary importance. 例如，对于 EN-US 区域性名称，你可能希望你的应用程序显示 "Estados Unidos" 而不是 "美国"。For example, for the es-US culture name, you'll probably want your application to display "Estados Unidos" instead of "United States". 使用国家/地区名称 (我们) 单独生成 "美国"，而不考虑语言，因此应改为使用区域性名称。Using the country/region name (US) alone yields "United States" regardless of the language, so you should work with the culture name instead. - 必须考虑脚本差异。When script differences must be considered. 例如，国家/地区 AZ 处理具有 AZ-Latn-AZ 和 AZ-Cyrl-AZ 的阿塞拜疆文化，并且对于此国家/地区，拉丁语和西里尔文脚本可能会有很大的不同。For example, the country/region AZ deals with Azerbaijani cultures that have the names az-Latn-AZ and az-Cyrl-AZ, and the Latin and Cyrillic scripts can be very different for this country/region. - 维护详细信息非常重要。When maintenance of detail is important. 成员返回的值 可能不同，具体取决于是否 使用区域性名称或区域名称实例化对象。The values returned by members can differ depending on whether the object was instantiated by using a culture name or a region name. 例如，下表列出了 使用 "us" 区域、"en-us" 区域性和 "en-us" 区域性对对象进行实例化时返回值之间的差异。For example, the following table lists the differences in return values when a object is instantiated by using the "US" region, the "en-US" culture, and the "es-US" culture. |成员Member|反馈"US"|“en-US”"en-US"|"es-US""es-US"| |------------|----------|--------------|--------------| ||美元US Dollar|美元US Dollar|Dólar de。UU.Dólar de EE.UU.| ||USUS|en-USen-US|es-USes-US| ||United StatesUnited States|United StatesUnited States|Estados UnidosEstados Unidos| ||USUS|en-USen-US|es-USes-US| ## Examples 下面的示例演示了类的多个成员 。The following example demonstrates several members of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/CPP/regioninfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/CS/regioninfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/VB/regioninfo.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 culture) cil managed

span.span: A culture identifier.

summary.span: 基于与指定的区域性标识符关联的国家/地区初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the country/region associated with the specified culture identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议用于实例化对象的构造函数 。 is the recommended constructor for instantiating a object. 与 需要数值区域性标识符作为参数的构造函数不同，其参数是可读性更强的区域性名称或国家/地区代码。Unlike the constructor that requires a numeric culture identifier as a parameter, its parameter is a more readable culture name or country code. 区域性标识符映射到相应的区域语言支持 (NLS) 区域设置标识符。The culture identifier is mapped to the corresponding National Language Support (NLS) locale identifier. 有关详细区域性信息，请参阅 "面向全球开发人员中心" 中的 " [ (NLS) API 参考](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) "。Detailed culture information appears in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 通过调用此构造函数实例化的新对象的属性的值是该国家/地区的 ISO 3166 2-字母代码，而不是组合语言和国家/地区代码。The value of the property of the new object instantiated by calling this constructor is the ISO 3166 2-letter code for the country/region, not the combined language and country/region code. 例如，如果 使用英语 (美国) 区域性的区域性标识符0x0409 对对象进行实例化，则属性的值 为 "US"。For example, if a object is instantiated with the culture identifier 0x0409 for the English (United States) culture, the value of the property is "US". 与此相反，如果 使用组合语言和国家/地区代码对英语 (美国) 区域性对对象进行实例化，则属性的值 为 "en-us"。In contrast, if a object is instantiated with the combined language and country/region code en-US for the English (United States) culture, the value of the property is "en-US". ## Examples 下面的代码示例对以 不同方式创建的两个实例进行比较。The following code example compares two instances of that were created differently. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/CPP/regioninfo_equals.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/CS/regioninfo_equals.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/VB/regioninfo_equals.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定固定、自定义或非特定区域性。

span.span: specifies either an invariant, custom, or neutral culture.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 一个字符串，它包含 ISO 3166 中为国家/地区定义的由两个字母组成的代码。

span.span: A string that contains a two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for country/region.
-or-

param.span: 包含特定区域、自定义区域或仅 Windows 区域的区域名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the culture name for a specific culture, custom culture, or Windows-only culture.

param.span: 如果区域性名称未采用 RFC 4646 格式，应用程序应指定整个区域性名称，而不是仅指定国家/地区。

span.span: If the culture name is not in RFC 4646 format, your application should specify the entire culture name instead of just the country/region.

summary.span: 基于按名称指定的国家/地区或特定区域性初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the country/region or specific culture, specified by name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name`参数是为国家/地区定义的代码之一，或者是特定的、自定义的或仅限 Windows 的区域性名称。The `name` parameter is either one of the codes defined for country/region, or a specific, custom, or Windows-only culture name. Case 并不重要。Case is not significant. 但是，、 和 属性以大写形式返回指定的代码或区域性名称。However, the , the , and the properties return the specified code or culture name in uppercase. 预定义的 名称列在 ISO 网站上的 " [国家/地区名称" 和 "代码" 元素](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591) 中。The predefined names are listed in [Country names and code elements](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591) on the ISO website. 应提供特定区域性的名称，而不是仅提供参数中的国家/地区名称 `name` 。You should provide the name of a specific culture rather than just a country/region name in the `name` parameter. 例如，en-us for 英语 (美国) 或 es for 西班牙语 (美国) 最好是我们，因为和等属性 反映特定语言。For example, en-US for English (United States) or es-US for Spanish (United States) is preferable to US because properties such as and reflect a specific language. az-Latn-AZ 或 AZ-Cyrl-AZ 比 AZ 更好，因为属性（例如 、 和） 反映特定的脚本。az-Latn-AZ or az-Cyrl-AZ is preferable to AZ because properties such as , , and reflect a specific script. 预定义的区域性名称在 "面向全球开发人员中心" 中的 " [ (NLS) API 参考" 区域](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) 中列出。The predefined culture names are listed in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 请注意，对此构造函数的调用将引发 `name` （如果是非特定区域性） (如 En for 英语) 。Note that a call to this constructor throws an if `name` is a neutral culture (such as en for English). ## Examples 下面的代码示例对以 不同方式创建的两个实例进行比较。The following code example compares two instances of that were created differently. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/CPP/regioninfo_equals.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/CS/regioninfo_equals.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/VB/regioninfo_equals.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例 使用区域性名称创建的实例。The following code example creates instances of using culture names. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName/CPP/regioninfo_ctorculturename.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName/CS/regioninfo_ctorculturename.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName/VB/regioninfo_ctorculturename.vb#1)]

para.span: 此构造函数只接受特定的区域性或国家/地区代码。

span.span: This constructor accepts only specific cultures or country/region codes.

para.span: 但是，某些非特定区域性名称与国家/地区代码相同。

span.span: However, some neutral culture names are the same as country/region codes.

para.span: 在这种情况下， 将解释为国家/地区代码，而不是非特定区域性名称，此构造函数不会引发 。

summary.span: 获取该国家/地区中使用的货币的英文名称。

span.span: Gets the name, in English, of the currency used in the country/region.

value.span: 该国家/地区中使用的货币的英文名称。

span.span: The name, in English, of the currency used in the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/cpp/rgn5props.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/CS/rgn5props.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/VB/rgn5props.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CurrencyNativeName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ CurrencyNativeName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取该国家/地区中使用的货币名称，它使用该国家/地区的本地语言格式表示。

span.span: Gets the name of the currency used in the country/region, formatted in the native language of the country/region.

value.span: 该国家/地区中使用的货币的本地名称，它使用与 ISO 3166 国家/地区代码关联的语言格式表示。

span.span: The native name of the currency used in the country/region, formatted in the language associated with the ISO 3166 country/region code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用 特定区域性创建当前对象，并在相应的国家/地区中使用多种语言，则 属性检索与特定区域性关联的货币名称。If the current object is created with a specific culture and more than one language is used in the corresponding country/region, the property retrieves the currency name associated with the specific culture. 此属性的值取决于与特定国家/地区关联的语言。The value of this property depends on the language that is associated with a particular country/region. 因此，如果要使用 属性，则应 通过 将构造函数传递成组合语言和国家/地区代码来实例化对象。Therefore, if you intend to use the property, you should instantiate the object by passing the constructor a combined language and country/region code. 例如，如果 使用英语 (加拿大) 的组合语言和国家/地区代码对对象进行实例化，则其属性的值 为 "加拿大元"。For example, if a object is instantiated with a combined language and country/region code of "en-CA" for English (Canada), the value of its property is "Canadian Dollar". 如果使用用于法语 (加拿大) 的组合语言和国家/地区代码对其进行实例化，则其属性的值 为 "canadien"。If it is instantiated with a combined language and country/region code of "fr-CA" for French (Canada), the value of its property is "Dollar canadien". 因此， `RegionInfo` 在这种情况下，仅使用国家/地区名称创建对象 ( "CA") 不一定足以区分适当的本机货币名称。Therefore, creating the `RegionInfo` object with only a country/region name ("CA" in this case) is not specific enough to distinguish the appropriate native currency name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/cpp/rgn5props.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/CS/rgn5props.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/VB/rgn5props.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CurrencySymbol As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ CurrencySymbol { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与国家/地区关联的货币符号。

span.span: Gets the currency symbol associated with the country/region.

value.span: 与国家/地区关联的货币符号。

span.span: The currency symbol associated with the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，美国的货币符号为 "$"。For example, the currency symbol for the United States is "$". 如果使用 特定区域性创建当前对象，并在相应的国家/地区中使用多种语言，则 属性将返回与特定区域性关联的货币符号。If the current object is created with a specific culture and more than one language is used in the corresponding country/region, the property returns the currency symbol associated with the specific culture. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示类的属性 。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取表示当前线程所使用的国家/地区的 。

span.span: Gets the that represents the country/region used by the current thread.

value.span: 表示当前线程所使用的国家/地区的 。

span.span: The that represents the country/region used by the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值基于通过控制面板的 "区域和语言选项" 部分选择的区域。The value of this property is based on the culture selected through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 但是，该信息在的生命周期内可能会更改 。However, that information can change during the life of the . 类不会自动检测系统设置中的更改，但 当你调用方法时，会更新属性 。The class does not automatically detect changes in the system settings, but the property is updated when you call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DisplayName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取以 .NET 本地化版本语言表示的国家/地区的全名。

span.span: Gets the full name of the country/region in the language of the localized version of .NET.

value.span: 以 .NET 的本地化版本语言的国家/地区的全名。

span.span: The full name of the country/region in the language of the localized version of .NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性以 .net 的本地化版本的语言显示国家/地区名称。The property displays the country/region name in the language of the localized version of .NET. 例如，该 属性在英语版本的 .net 上以英语显示国家/地区，在西班牙语版本的 .net 上以西班牙语显示。For example, the property displays the country/region in English on the English version of .NET, and in Spanish on the Spanish version of .NET. 该属性的值 从以当前用户界面区域性的语言（由表示）中的资源文件中获取 。The value of the property is taken from the resource files in the language of the current user interface culture, represented by . 自定义区域或操作系统合成的区域可能不包含资源信息，在这种情况下，的值与 属性的值相同 。Custom regions or those synthesized from the operating system might not have resource information, in which case the value for is the same as the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示类的属性 。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]

value.span: 以英文表示的国家/地区的全名。

span.span: The full name of the country/region in English.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如， 为英语 (美国) 区域性创建的对象将显示 "美国"。For example, a object created for the English (United States) culture displays "United States". ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示类的属性 。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property GeoId As Integer
public: virtual property int GeoId { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取地理区域、国家/地区、城市或地点的唯一标识号。

span.span: Gets a unique identification number for a geographical region, country, city, or location.

value.span: 一个唯一标识地理位置的 32 位有符号数字。

span.span: A 32-bit signed number that uniquely identifies a geographical location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序应使用 属性向客户提供区域性特定的服务。The application should use the property to provide culture-specific services to customers. 例如， 属性可用作访问包含有关国家/地区的特定信息的数据库记录的键。For example, the property can be used as a key to access a database record that contains specific information about a country/region. 此属性值对应于 Windows `GetUserGeoID` 函数。This property value corresponds to the Windows `GetUserGeoID` function. 有关地理标识符的列表，请参阅 MSDN Library 中 [的地理位置表](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191287) 。For a list of geographical identifiers, see [Table of Geographical Locations](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191287) in the MSDN Library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/cpp/rgn5props.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/CS/rgn5props.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/VB/rgn5props.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的名称或 ISO 3166 双字母国家/地区代码。

span.span: Gets the name or ISO 3166 two-letter country/region code for the current object.

value.span: 构造函数的 参数指定的值。

span.span: The value specified by the parameter of the constructor.
The return value is in uppercase.
-or-

value.span: ISO 3166 中为 构造函数的 参数指定的国家/地区定义的双字母代码。

span.span: The two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region specified by the parameter of the constructor.
The return value is in uppercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前 对象是使用 采用区域性标识符参数的构造函数创建的，则 属性值是在 ISO 3166 中为国家/地区定义的由两个字母组成的代码之一，格式为大写。If the current object is created with the constructor that takes a culture identifier parameter, the property value is one of the two-letter codes defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region and is formatted in uppercase. 例如，美国的双字母代码为 "US"。For example, the two-letter code for the United States is "US". 如果当前 对象是使用 构造函数创建的，并且传递的是完整的区域性名称（如 "en-us"），则 属性值是中 .NET Framework 的完整区域性名称，并且只是 .net Core 中的区域名称。If the current object is created with the constructor and is passed a full culture name such as "en-US", the property value is a full culture name in .NET Framework and just the region name in .NET Core. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示类的属性 。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property NativeName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ NativeName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个国家/地区的名称，它使用该国家/地区的本地语言格式表示。

span.span: Gets the name of a country/region formatted in the native language of the country/region.

value.span: 该国家/地区的本地名称，它使用与 ISO 3166 国家/地区代码关联的语言格式表示。

span.span: The native name of the country/region formatted in the language associated with the ISO 3166 country/region code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果 `RegionInfo` 对象是使用完整区域性名称构造的，则属性检索完整的区域性名称。The property retrieves a full culture name if the `RegionInfo` object is constructed using a full culture name. 建议使用区域性名称（例如，"en-us" 表示英语 (美国) -访问 属性。We recommend that you use the culture name - for example, "en-US" for English (United States) - to access the property. 用于此属性的字符串取决于与该国家/地区关联的语言。The string used for this property depends on the language associated with the country/region. 例如，对于英语 (的区域性名称 en-us 美国) ，对于西班牙语 (美国) 可以在 Windows Vista 上检索不同的值。For example, the culture names en-US for English (United States) and es-US for Spanish (United States) can retrieve different values on Windows Vista. 因此， `RegionInfo` 只使用美国国家/地区名称创建对象并不太具体，无法区分合适的字符串。Therefore, creating the `RegionInfo` object with only a country/region name of US is not specific enough to distinguish the appropriate string. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/cpp/rgn5props.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/CS/rgn5props.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/VB/rgn5props.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ThreeLetterISORegionName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ThreeLetterISORegionName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在 ISO 3166 中定义的由三个字母组成的国家/地区代码。

span.span: Gets the three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.

value.span: 在 ISO 3166 中定义的由三个字母组成的国家/地区代码。

span.span: The three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含在此国家/地区 ISO 3166 中定义的由三个字母组成的代码。The property contains the three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for this country/region. 例如，美国的三字母代码为 "USA"。For example, the three-letter code for United States is "USA". Case 并不重要。Case is not significant. 但是，、 和 属性以大写形式返回相应的代码。However, the , the , and the properties return the appropriate code in uppercase. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示类的属性 。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]

span.span: The three-letter code assigned by Windows to the country/region represented by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，美国的三字母代码为 "USA"。For example, the three-letter code for United States is "USA". ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示类的属性 。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回一个字符串，它包含区域性名称或 ISO 3166 中为当前 指定的双字母国家/地区代码。

span.span: Returns a string containing the culture name or ISO 3166 two-letter country/region codes specified for the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 此方法返回属性的值 。This method returns the value of the property. Case 并不重要。Case is not significant. 但是，、 和 属性以大写形式返回相应的代码。However, the , the , and the properties return the appropriate code in uppercase. 预定义的 名称在 类主题中列出。The predefined names are listed in the class topic.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property TwoLetterISORegionName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ TwoLetterISORegionName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在 ISO 3166 中定义的由两个字母组成的国家/地区代码。

span.span: Gets the two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.

value.span: 在 ISO 3166 中定义的由两个字母组成的国家/地区代码。

span.span: The two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该 名称是在 ISO 3166 中为国家/地区定义的由两个字母组成的代码之一。The name is one of the two-letter codes defined in ISO 3166 for country/region. 例如，美国的双字母代码为 "US"。For example, the two-letter code for United States is "US". > [!IMPORTANT] > 在某些情况下， 属性可以包含两个以上的字符。In some cases, the property may have more than two characters. 例如， 加勒比海地区的属性的值为 "029"。For example, the value of the property for the Caribbean region is "029". Case 并不重要。Case is not significant. 但是，、 和 属性以大写形式返回相应的代码。However, the , the , and the properties return the appropriate code in uppercase. > [!WARNING] > 如果要持久保存 对象或在进程之间进行通信，应使用完整的区域性名称而不是两个字母的 ISO 区域代码来实例化对象。If you want to persist a object or communicate it between processes, you should instantiate it by using a full culture name rather than a two-letter ISO region code. 因为 属性依赖于脚本和语言，所以 仅使用区域代码实例化对象会丢失上下文和数据。Because properties depend on script and language, instantiating a object by using only a region code loses context and data. 预定义的 名称在 ISO 网站上的 " [英语国家/地区名称" 和 "代码元素](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591) " 中列出。The predefined names are listed in [English country names and code elements](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591) on the ISO website. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示类的属性 。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]
